business.headline: Zerodha CEO Nithin Kamath's money advice: 'No shortcuts to getting rich'Nithin Kamath shared a video with a powerful message—earning more doesn't mean you're saving more. In fact, higher income often leads to more spending on gadgets, clothes, dining out, or things meant just to impress others.

Trump tariffs, trade war fears could bring your loan EMIs down further this yearBorrowers could emerge as the unexpected winners if global headwinds linger and domestic growth slows further, with the RBI likely to step in again to lower the key interest rates.

Wall Street crashes, Dalal Street rallies: 5 things investors should knowStock market today: Dalal Street's leading indices rallied sharply, defying a global sell-off sparked by Wall Street's overnight crash. Here are the key factors behind today's stock market rally.

Mutual fund inflows fall for March by Rs 4,221 crore, shows AMFI dataEquity mutual fund inflows dropped by Rs 4,221 crore in March, falling to Rs 25,082 crore from Rs 29,303 crore in February 2025, as per data released by the Association of Mutual Funds in India (AMFI).

TCS shares fall after disappointing Q4. Check latest price targetsTCS share price: Despite a muted Q4, brokerages back TCS with revised targets, betting on deal wins, margin levers, and recovery prospects to drive medium-term gains.

Sensex jumps 1,400 points: 3 things to know about Dalal Street rallyShare market today: A surprise rally may have lit up the screens, but with volatility still lurking and trade risks unresolved, investors would do well to tread carefully through this temporary pocket of optimism.

Sensex up by 1,300 points, Nifty above 22,500 as markets cheer tariff pauseStock market today: The S&P BSE Sensex surged 1,353.59 points to 75,200.74, while the NSE Nifty 50 gained 443.70 points to 22,842.85 as of 9:43 am.

Stock market today: Will Sensex, Nifty open higher on 90-day pause on tariffs?Sensex, Nifty today: Early signs suggest a positive start. Gift Nifty futures were trading at 22,933.5 at 8:20 am, showing a 2.5% jump from Nifty 50's Wednesday close of 22,399.15.

TCS to delay salary hike? Check what top management said after Q4 resultsTCS reported a net profit of Rs 12,224 crore for the fourth quarter of FY25. This is a 1.7% drop compared to Rs 12,434 crore reported in the same quarter last year.

Stocks to watch on April 11: TCS, Accenture, Deloitte, Tata Steel, BHELKey stocks to watch in today's trade include shares of TCS, Accenture, Deloitte, Tata Steel, BHEL Sun Pharma, Bharti Hexacom due to various news developments and third quarter results.

China tops FDI Confidence Index for third consecutive year, India slips to 5thChina has reaffirmed its position as one of the world's leading FDI hubs in the top 10 for four years and number one emerging market for three years. Despite global tensions, investors remain optimistic, with India ranking 5th among emerging markets in 2025.

US stocks dive as euphoria on Wall Street reverts to fear about US-China trade warUS stocks declined on Thursday after making historic gains a day earlier amid tensions between Washington and Beijing over tariffs.

Trump's 26% additional tariffs on India suspended till July 9: White HouseOn April 2, US President Donald Trump slapped universal duties on about 60 countries exporting goods to America and additional steep levies on countries like India.

Will Dalal Street cash in on Trump's 90-day tariff timeout?The US President's unexpected decision to announce a 90-day pause on reciprocal tariffs—with China being the notable exception—has reignited global risk appetite.

Italy's Prada agrees to buy fashion rival Versace in nearly $1.4 billion dealThe price Prada has agreed to pay for Versace is a big discount to the roughly USD 2.15 billion including debt that Capri paid for Versace in 2018.

TCS Q4 Results: Profit falls 2% to Rs 12,224 crore, final dividend at Rs 30TCS ends FY25 with strong deal wins but earnings miss estimates, capping a tough year for the IT giant as macro headwinds and weak discretionary spending weigh on profit growth.

EPFO introduces face authentication for UAN generation. Know detailsNow, both employers and employees can generate a UAN by simply using facial recognition via the government's UMANG app. This is expected to solve common problems such as incorrect personal details or missing mobile numbers, which often delayed UAN generation.

Apple airlifts 600 tons of iPhones from India to dodge Trump's China tariffsThe devices were flown out of the Chennai airport in the southern state of Tamil Nadu, where Apple has been building up production through its manufacturing partners like Foxconn and Tata.

TCS Q4 results to be announced today: What to expect from the IT firm?Investors and market watchers are expecting a mixed performance from the IT major. Key focus areas include operating margins, revenue growth, deal wins, employee attrition, and management commentary on guidance for the year ahead.

Sanjeev Sanyal says tariff-hit NRI relatives calling to ask for paracetamol, iPhonesDonald Trump has hinted at imposing new tariffs on pharmaceuticals, a move that could raise costs for Indian pharmaceutical companies. This would make Indian-made generic drugs more expensive for both Americans and Indian consumers.

90 days, $500 billion, one big shot: India's trade gamble in Trump's tariff pauseThe pause in tariffs is seen in New Delhi as more than just goodwill; it's strategic. By sparing countries like India, the US appears to be isolating China in what is shaping up to be the most aggressive round of trade hostilities since the Covid-19 pandemic.

Explained: What US-China trade war means for India and the worldWith tariffs flying thick and fast, supply chains unravelling, and geopolitical tensions rising, India, like much of the world, finds itself watching, waiting, and bracing for impact.

Bitcoin jumps over 6% after Trump's 90-day tariff break; Ethereum, XRP rallyBitcoin, along with other major cryptos like Ethereum, XRP, Cardano, Solana, and Dogecoin, etc., are witnessing a surge in their prices post US President Donald Trump's announcement of a 90-day pause on new tariff hikes.

Zerodha CEO Nithin Kamath on market crash: 'Investors may stay away for years'In 2008, the global market took a major hit with the collapse of Lehman Brothers, a global financial services firm and one of the largest investment banks in the US, causing a ripple effect around the world.

Should stock market investors take Donald Trump's 'buy' tip seriously?From aggressive tariffs on China to sudden pauses and vague reassurances, the whiplash is real and investors are feeling it. Markets bleed one day and bounce back the next, all thanks to a tweet or a policy pivot from the US President.

RBI is cutting key rates, but are banks passing them on?RBI announced a cut in the repo rate by 25 basis points, bringing it down to 6% on Wednesday. The decision was made after the central bank's Monetary Policy Committee (MPC), led by Governor Sanjay Malhotra, finished its three-day meeting which started on April 7.

China's Yuan falls to 17-year low after Trump tariffs kick inThe decline in Yuan comes as a trade war between the world's two largest economies escalates. US President Donald Trump's "reciprocal" tariffs on dozens of countries took effect on Wednesday, including massive 104% duties on Chinese goods.

Global markets jump as Donald Trump hits pause on tariffsGlobal markets rise: The S&P 500 and the Nasdaq saw their biggest daily percentage rises in over 10 years, adding over $1.5 trillion in market value.

Mahavir Jayanti holiday: Are Sensex and Nifty open for trading today?Stock market holiday: According to the official stock market holiday list, Mahavir Jayanti is one of three holidays in April. The other two are on April 14 for Dr Baba Saheb Ambedkar Jayanti and April 18 for Good Friday.

World's biggest green cargo ship, MSC Turkiye docks at Adani's Vizhinjam PortMSC Turkiye: The vessel is 399.9 metres long, 61.3 metres wide, and has a depth of 33.5 metres. It has the capacity to carry 24,346 twenty-foot equivalent units (TEUs), making it one of the largest container ships ever built.

Wall Street surges as Trump hits pause on tariffs, Dow jumps over 2,300 pointsWall Street jumped after President Trump paused new tariffs for 90 days, easing trade worries. Big tech companies like Apple and Nvidia led the gains.
Sensex falls over 350 points, Nifty below 22,500; banking stocks downThe S&P BSE Sensex was down 379.73 points to close at 73,847.15, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 136.70 points to end at 22,399.15.
From Rajdhani to Vande Bharat: Investor criticises India's lag in train techWhen Rajdhani was launched in 1969, it placed India among Asia's fastest rail nations, second only to Japan.

RBI Governor says US tariff impact on growth bigger worry than inflationThe RBI's rate cut comes at a time when inflation appears to be under control, but economic growth faces risks from global uncertainty after US tariffs imposed by President Donald Trump.

RBI rate cut brings relief for borrowers, but banking stocks tumble. Here's whyBanking stocks, especially public sector lenders, took a sharp hit after the rate cut announcement. The Nifty Bank index was down nearly 1%, with major losers including Bank of Baroda, Canara Bank, Punjab National Bank, and SBI.

RBI monetary policy: 6 key takeaways from MPC meetingWith the repo rate cut, borrowing costs for home and personal loans are likely to fall. This would provide a big relief to the homebuyers and could boost the housing market.

RBI MPC meeting: 5 key development reforms you must knowCurrently, UPI payments are mostly capped at Rs 1 lakh for both P2P and P2M. The RBI has suggested that National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) may now review and revise these limits based on evolving user needs.

RBI cuts Repo Rate by 25 points to 6% amid global trade warThe Reserve Bank of India has cut the repo rate by 25 basis points to 6%, potentially leading to lower EMIs for home loans. The RBI has also lowered the GDP forecast for FY26 to 6.5% from the earlier 6.7%. The Monetary Policy Committee unanimously decided to change the stance from neutral to accommodative, hinting at possible further easing. The RBI Governor expressed concerns over global trade uncertainties and their potential impact on inflation and growth.

Cheaper home, auto loan EMIs after RBI rate cut. What it means for youRBI reduces key lending rate to 6%. Lower interest rates are expected to make borrowing cheaper, which can help people buy homes or vehicles more easily.

RBI changes stance from neutral to accommodative: What does it mean?The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) Governor Sanjay Malhotra has announced a cut in the repo rate by 25 basis points, bringing it down from 6.25% to 6%.

entertainment.headline: Rajamouli 'thrilled' at RRR's mention as Oscars adds Best Stunt Design categoryFilmmaker SS Rajamouli was thrilled after The Academy gave his film 'RRR' an honorary mention as it introduced Best Stunt Design category. The Academy included 'RRR', 'Mission Impossible' and 'Everything Everywhere All at Once' in the announcement poster.

Gippy Grewal's Akaal faces backlash for alleged misrepresentation of Sikh CommunityThe latest Punjabi film Akaal is in troubled waters after Sikh leader Baba Bakshish Singh condemned it for hurting Sikh sentiments. It stars Gippy Grewal, Nimrat Khaira and Nikitin Dheer.

Chhorii 2 review: Nushrratt-Soha's film fights social evils but where's the scare?Released-Fri Apr 11, 2025The much-anticipated sequel 'Chhorii 2' promised to blend horror with social issues but left audiences wanting more. The film struggles to deliver the intended chills, leading to a lacklustre experience.
Grey's Anatomy actor Eric Dane, 52, diagnosed with ALSActor Eric Dane has announced his ALS diagnosis in a statement to PEOPLE, expressing gratitude for his family's support.

Actor Nitanshi Goel halts ramp walk, touches Hema Malini's feet, hugs Sushmita SenIn a touching moment at a Mumbai fashion show, Laapataa Ladies actor Nitanshi Goel paused her ramp walk to pay respects to veteran actor Hema Malini. Additionally, she also hugged Sushmita Sen, who was also present at the event with her model Rohman Shawl.

Jaat box office Day 1: Sunny Deol, Randeep Hooda film off to a decent startSunny Deol is back with 'Jaat', following the massive success of 'Gadar 2'. The film opened with moderate earnings, marking a stark contrast to his previous blockbuster.

Good Bad Ugly box office Day 1: Smashing opening for Ajith Kumar's film in IndiaAjith Kumar's 'Good Bad Ugly' opened strong at the box office on Day 1. The film surpassed the opening day numbers of Ajith's previous movies, 'Vidaamuyarchi' and 'Thunivu'.

Hrithik Roshan 'afraid, nervous' about turning director: I'm back in kindergartenActor Hrithik Roshan is set to don the director's hat for 'Krrish 4'. At a recent event in the US, Roshan opened up about the uncertainties and challenges that come with this new role.

Sushmita Sen attends event with ex Rohman, his reaction to paps' request goes viralActor Sushmita Sen and her ex-boyfriend Rohman Shawl were seen together at an event, stirring curiosity about their relationship. Despite their 2021 breakup, their public appearances keep fans speculating.

RRR gets honorary mention as The Academy announces new Stunt Design categoryDirector SS Rajamouli's RRR, starring Jr NTR and Ram Charan, got a special mention as The Academy introduced a new category - Stunt Design - to honour best action choreography. The award will be included in the 100th Oscars in 2028.

Ranveer Allahbadia discusses 'low phase' with Emraan Hashmi in new podcastYouTuber and podcaster Ranveer Allahbadia talked about his 'low phase' with actor Emraan Hashmi in his new podcast. The actor had a candid conversation about friendships in Bollywood and how 'friend' is a misused term in the industry.

Kanye West blames Taylor Swift for Super Bowl snub in post, deletes it laterKanye West blames Taylor Swift, George Bush's remarks, and his MAGA hat for never performing at the Super Bowl. In a deleted post, he reignites his feud with Swift and claims these controversies, not his antisemitic comments, led to his exclusion.

​Emma Corrin, Jack Lowden, Olivia Colman to star in Netflix's Pride and Prejudice​Emma Corrin, Jack Lowden and Olivia Colman are set to star in Netflix's 'Pride & Prejudice'. The production of the miniseries is scheduled to begin in the UK later this year.

Neeraj Ghaywan's Homebound with Ishaan Khatter, Janhvi selected for Cannes 2025Filmmaker Neeraj Ghaywan's Homebound, featuring Ishaan Khatter and Janhvi Kapoor, will be screened at Cannes 2025. The movie has been selected for the prestigious Un Certain Regard category.

Anupam Kher visits Manoj Kumar's home, meets his family and pays tributeActor Anupam Kher recently visited Manoj Kumar's residence and paid tribute to the legendary actor. Kumar died on April 4 due to prolonged illness.

Jaat box office prediction Day 1: Sunny Deol film poised for a modest openingJaat box office prediction Day 1: Actor Sunny Deol's Jaat is looking at a decent day one figure. The actioner also stars Randeep Hooda and Viineet Kumar Singh in pivotal roles.

Alappuzha Gymkhana review: Unconventional sports drama with emotional uppercutsReleased-Thu Apr 10, 2025Alappuzha Gymkhana movie review: The film is less about the power of punches and more about what it means to stumble, try, and still show up. Despite its tonal shifts and uneven emotional payoff, the film thrives in its charming chaos.

Filmmaker Ram Gopal Varma booked for alleged anti-Hindu remarks on social mediaA regional political party in Andhra Pradesh has accused filmmaker Ram Gopal Varma of making derogatory remarks on Hindu religion through social media, calling for legal action under BNS provisions.

Aaditi Pohankar calls Aashram 'a game changer': It has given me everythingAaditi Pohankar discussed her journey into the limelight, focusing on her breakthrough role in 'Aashram' and her relaxed approach towards fame in the Indian entertainment industry.

general news.headline: Tahawwur Rana's NIA interrogation begins, 26/11 attacks plot, ISI link in focus Live UpdatesWith Tahawwur Rana securely in its custody, the NIA began questioning the 26/11 plotter about his involvement in the conspiracy to commit terrorist acts alongside notorious figures such as David Headley.
Security forces kill terrorist in J&K's Kishtwar as gunfight continues for 3rd daySecurity forces kill terrorist in J&K's Kishtwar as gunfight continues for third day

PM briefed about gangrape of 19-year-old in Varanasi, orders strict actionAccording to a statement from the Uttar Pradesh government, PM Modi instructed the officials to take the "strictest possible action" against those involved and to ensure such crimes are prevented through strong administrative and policing measures.

Attackers deserve Pak's highest honour, Tahawwur Rana told David Headley: USIn an official statement on Tahawwur Rana's extradition to India, the US Department of Justice disclosed fresh details about the former Pakistan army officer and his links to David Headley.

Who was Agustin Escobar, Siemens Spain CEO who was killed in Hudson chopper crash?A private helicopter carrying Siemens Spain CEO Agustin Escobar and his family crashed into the Hudson River, killing all six aboard, including three children. Authorities have cited mid-air structural failure.

Big leadership announcement expected following Amit Shah's Tamil Nadu visit?Amid leadership speculation, Tamil Nadu BJP braces for major changes following Union Home Minister Amit Shah's visit, with Annamalai's future uncertain and AIADMK potentially gaining a larger role in the NDA alliance.

Is 26/11 plotter David Coleman Headley a double agent shielded by US?India has taken 26/11 terror-attack conspirator Tahawwur Rana into its custody. Though the US has extradited Rana, it seems to be dragging its feet on the extradition of key plotter David Coleman Headley, a bigger fish. Is Headley a double agent who the US is not ready to hand over to India?

DMK Minister removed from party post for vulgar comparisons of Hindu tilaksTamil Nadu Minister K Ponmudi made a vulgar joke in a public forum, which compared Hindu 'tilaks' with sexual positions. The comment sparked outrage, with even party leader Kanimozhi condemning the remark. The DMK removed him as deputy general secretary.

Nitish Kumar and Chandrababu Naidu: From Modi's bitter rivals to trusted alliesIn a sense, both Nitish Kumar and Chandrababu Naidu have made political survival an art form, one where a suitable elasticity in approach ensures longevity in power.

LIVE: Tahawwur Rana's interrogation begins at NIA headquartersTahawwur Rana News Live: The National Investigation Agency (NIA) questioning of 26/11 Mumbai terror attack accused has started. Tahawwur Rana was sent to 18-day custody of the NIA following his extradition from the United States on Thursday. He was arrested by the NIA upon arrival at Delhi airport. A detailed questionnaire has been prepared for the interrogation, which will be conducted by NIA officers of SP and DSP rank. Follow indiatoday.in for more updates.

First images of Tahawwur Rana, in chains, being handed over to NIA team in USThe visuals show Tahawwur Rana, in chains, being escorted by US Marshals in what seems like an Army airbase. The 26/11 attacks plotter was extradited to India on Thursday.

Virat Kohli angry with Patidar? RCB star's animated chat with coach goes viralRoyal Challengers Bengaluru lost their home game against Delhi Capitals on Thursday. Virat Kohli, seemingly upset with the captaincy decisions, was seen having an animated chat with Dinesh Karthik.
Grey's Anatomy actor Eric Dane, 52, diagnosed with ALSActor Eric Dane has announced his ALS diagnosis in a statement to PEOPLE, expressing gratitude for his family's support.

Inside the Den: How the sex determination racket operatesIn Part 2 of the Vanishing Daughters series, the India Today team goes undercover to expose the ruthless mechanics of India's sex determination racket. From shadowy clinics in Hisar to covert meetings with middlewomen, this investigation reveals how profit, prejudice, and technology collide to erase unborn daughters—one illicit scan at a time.

Trump hits defiant China with more tariffs, total levy now at 145%President Trump intensified the ongoing trade battle with China by sharply raising tariffs on Chinese goods to 145%, the White House confirmed. In response, China hit back with 84% tariffs and began strengthening ties with Europe and Asia to ease the pressure.

Assam Class 10 result 2025 declared, pass percentage at 63.98%: Direct linkThe Assam HSLC Class 10 results 2025 have been declared, and the overall pass percentage is 63.98%. Students can check their scores online at sebaonline.org and assamresult.in using their roll numbers.

A weekend of royal living in a palace built by a Colonel, just 2 hours from DelhiNoormahal in Karnal was built in 2009 as a hotel inspired by the architectural marvels and opulent royalty of the era of Indian maharaja.

Passport rule relaxed, now add spouse's name without marriage certificateThe Ministry of External Affairs (MEA) has simplified the process of adding a spouse's name to Indian passports. Applicants no longer need to provide a marriage certificate, making the procedure more accessible and less time-consuming.

Video: Helicopter spins, plunges into Hudson River; tech CEO and family killedAgustin Escobar, the head of the Spanish division of tech giant Siemens, and his wife and three children were among those killed when a New York City sightseeing helicopter crashed into the Hudson River.
Raise voice against America: PM Modi's 2011 video on Tahawwur Rana is viral26/11 plotter Tahawwur Rana was brought back to India on Thursday after the United States cleared his extradition.

Actor Nitanshi Goel halts ramp walk, touches Hema Malini's feet, hugs Sushmita SenIn a touching moment at a Mumbai fashion show, Laapataa Ladies actor Nitanshi Goel paused her ramp walk to pay respects to veteran actor Hema Malini. Additionally, she also hugged Sushmita Sen, who was also present at the event with her model Rohman Shawl.

Fortified cell, 24x7 watch: How NIA is holding 26/11 plotter Tahawwur RanaTahawwur Rana's cell is under 24-hour surveillance, equipped with CCTV cameras, and guarded round the clock by security personnel. The cell measures approximately 14 by 14 feet and includes a bed placed directly on the floor, along with an attached bathroom.

Nothing is purely business now: Jaishankar on India factor in US-China tariff warThe foreign minister's remarks came days after US President Donald Trump temporarily eased tariffs on several trading partners, including India, only to slap China with steeper levies.

Family of four found hanging at Kerala home in suspected suicideThe Kerala police discovered a family of four members, including two children, hanging at their residence in Upputhara village in Idukki, Kerala, on Thursday. Investigation revealed that the family was reportedly going through financial distress.

sports.headline: MS Dhoni's cheeky jibe at KKR coach: The traitor is hereIPL 2025: MS Dhoni's return as CSK skipper brought a warm reunion with Dwayne Bravo, but not without a playful jab — calling his former teammate and now KKR mentor a "traitor" ahead of their big clash.
What difference can MS Dhoni's return as captain make to CSK?MS Dhoni returns as the Chennai Super Kings captain in the match vs KKR. What difference can he make to the sinking ship this season?

PSL bans Corbin Bosch for one-year after last moment withdrawal to play IPLCorbin Bosch has been handed a one-year ban by the PCB and PSL after pulling out of the league, marking a strict move to discourage players from backing out after being drafted. Bosch was roped in by Mumbai Indians as in injury replacement for IPL 2025.

Virat Kohli angry with Patidar? RCB star's animated chat with coach goes viralRoyal Challengers Bengaluru lost their home game against Delhi Capitals on Thursday. Virat Kohli, seemingly upset with the captaincy decisions, was seen having an animated chat with Dinesh Karthik.

Manchester United's Andre Onana slammed by Paul Scholes for 'terrible' Lyon errorsAndre Onana's costly mistakes denied Manchester United a first-leg win, as Lyon held them to a 2-2 draw in the Europa League quarter-final, leaving all to play for at Old Trafford.

CSK turn to talisman MS Dhoni amidst dwindling form in IPL 2025Chennai Super Kings are once again under the captaincy of MS Dhoni after Ruturaj Gaikwad was ruled out of the competition due to a fracture. They will take on a strong KKR side who have the ability to thrive on slow turning tracks.

Watch: RCB's Tim David shows KL Rahul's 'my ground' celebration to du PlessisKL Rahul's emotional return to Chinnaswamy turned into a statement performance as his unbeaten 93 powered Delhi Capitals past RCB—fuelling fan chatter around his celebration and even sparking a post-match recreation of the same from Tim David.

Rain helped DC? Dinesh Karthik opens up after RCB lose back-to-back home matchesIPL 2025: Mentor Dinesh Karthik said that Royal Challengers Bengaluru lost momentum after rain arrived in the second half of the Delhi Capitals' innings on Thursday at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium.

KL Rahul said it's his home ground: Stubbs on DC batter's mindset vs RCBDelhi Capitals all-rounder Tristan Stubbs praised KL Rahul's calm and confident knock against RCB, revealing how the senior batter took charge of the chase and made things easy for him at a familiar Chinnaswamy Stadium.

KL Rahul Pro Max: Flexible and fearless, DC star lets bat do the talkingKL Rahul has brought out his new avatar in the ongoing Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025), which is unfazed, confident and has full faith in his abilities. He's ready to script the most glorious chapter of his IPL career and is set to become even more dangerous as Delhi Capitals march ahead in the competition.

Dhoni as captain won't automatically turn the tide for CSK: UthappaIPL 2025: Robin Uthappa said that Chennai Super Kings have plenty to think about and only MS Dhoni's return as captain won't help them make a comeback in the tournament.

Dhoni as captain won't automatically turn the tide for CSK: UthappaIPL 2025: Robin Uthappa said that Chennai Super Kings have plenty to think about and only MS Dhoni's return as captain won't help them make a comeback in the tournament.

MS Dhoni returns as captain: Records of CSK legend in IPLIPL 2025: MS Dhoni has returned as captain of the Chennai Super Kings after Ruturaj Gaikwad was ruled out due to a hairline fracture in his elbow. MS Dhoni will lead for the first time since the 2023 final against Gujarat Titans.

Ruturaj reveals injury details, prays 'young' MS Dhoni to turn CSK campaignIPL 2025: Ruturaj Gaikwad said that he was gutted after being ruled out, but also showed faith in MS Dhoni to help Chennai Super Kings make a comeback after four losses on the trot.
MLB: Emaarion Boyd steals spotlight with six stolen bases, without a hitEmaarion Boyd made minor league history Wednesday night by stealing six bases in a single game, without recording a hit.

DC star KL Rahul happy to use home comforts to torment RCB again in BengaluruDelhi Capitals star KL Rahul said he knows about the Chinnaswamy stadium more than anyone else as he tormented Royal Challengers Bengaluru once again. Rahul was the match-winner as DC continued their unbeaten run.

Watch: KL Rahul recreates Ronaldo's calma celebration after 93 vs RCBDelhi Capitals (DC) batter KL Rahul brought out an aggressive celebration following his match-winning innings against Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) in Match 24 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) at the M. Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru.

NFL: T.J. Watt's Steelers future in question as contract nears endThe Pittsburgh Steelers have built their legacy on a dominant defense, and T.J. Watt has been the face of that tradition. But as a pivotal season approaches, uncertainty looms.

KL Rahul haunts RCB again in Bengaluru as DC continue unbeaten runLocal boy KL Rahul came back to haunt his former side RCB with a stunning performance as DC maintained their unbeaten run in the IPL 2025 season. RCB were left to rue on the bright start they made as Delhi came back into the contest with their impressive bowling.

MS Dhoni had no hesitation to step in as captain: CSK head coachChennai Super Kings (CSK) head coach Stephen Fleming revealed that legendary wicketkeeper batter MS Dhoni understood the team's situation and had no hesitation to step in as captain after Rututaj Gaikwad got ruled out of the entire Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) due to an elbow injury.

Varun Chakravarthy at Chepauk will be an advantage for KKR vs CSK: Venkatesh IyerKKR vice-captain Venkatesh Iyer has said that having Varun Chakravarthy at the Chepauk will be an advantage for them in their clash against CSK on April 11. Varun will be coming to play in his home conditions.

61 for 0 to 163/7: Kuleep, Vipraj's spin magic choke RCB after fiery startDelhi Capitals (DC) made a remarkable comeback with the ball against Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) in Match 24 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) as they restricted them to 163 despite a fiery start in the powerplay.

Watch: CSK Head coach announces MS Dhoni as captain for remainder of IPL 2025Chennai Super Kings (CSK) head coach Stephen Fleming announced MS Dhoni as their new skipper for the remainder of Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) after Ruturaj Gaikwad got ruled out due to hairline fracture on his elbow.

Virat Kohli slammed by fans after Phil Salt's run out in RCB vs DC: SelfishVirat Kohli was slammed by the fans for his involvement in the run out of Phil Salt during the RCB vs DC clash on Thursday, April 10. Salt was in fine form before being run out.

MS Dhoni as Chennai Super Kings captain is a different beast: Sourav GangulyFormer India captain Sourav Ganguly has made a big statement on MS Dhoni, saying that he's a different beast altogether as the captain of Chennai Super Kings (CSK).

The Masters 2025: Scheffler eyes third green jacket, Rory seeks his firstThe 89th edition of The Masters teed off Thursday with its largest field in a decade and two players firmly in the spotlight: Scottie Scheffler and Rory McIlroy.

Captain MS Dhoni can pull out his magic and make CSK qualify: Ambati RayuduAmbati Rayudu is very excited to see MS Dhoni return as the captain of the Chennai Super Kings ahead of their clash against KKR on April 11. Dhoni replaces Ruturaj Gaikwad, who has been ruled out of the rest of the competition.

IPL 2025: KL Rahul back at number four as Faf du Plessis returns for DCIndia and Delhi Capitals (DC) batter KL Rahul will be marking his return in the middle order against Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) as Faf du Plessis has returned to playing XI.

Yaha aake dhindora nahi pitunga: Babar hits out at Pakistan cricket's criticsPSL 2023: Peshawar Zalmi captain Babar Azam was annoyed after a journalist asked him a question about the decline of Pakistan cricket after failures in the Champions Trophy and against New Zealand.

Watch: Luka Doncic reflects on his time with Mavericks, as Lakers defeat DallasThe Los Angeles Lakers guard Luka Doncic made his return to Dallas on Wednesday, April 9, during the NBA regular game. Playing against his former team for the first time since being traded to the Lakers.

Andre Russell's batting KKR spot: Venkatesh Iyer says all decisions well-thought ofVenkatesh Iyer has opened up about Andre Russell's batting position in the end KKR lineup ahead of their clash against CSK. Russell has struggled for form this season for the defending champions.

Thala is back: MS Dhoni's return as CSK captain thrills fans ahead of KKR clashMS Dhoni's return as Chennai Super Kings captain sent the fans into a frenzy on Thursday, April 10. Dhoni is all set to captain the side for the remainder of the season as Ruturaj Gaikwad was ruled out of the tournament.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
